articles.author: Ben Schoon
articles.title: OnePlus to launch Android 14 in September - 9to5Google
articles.description: OnePlus has announced its Android 14 update, OxygenOS 14, which will bring performance upgrades to the brand's phones.
articles.content:
OnePlus has today announced that it will launch OxygenOS 14, the brand’s skin on top of Android 14, on September 25.
OxygenOS 14 will be the second major update to OnePlus’ skin since the closer mer… [+2124 chars]

articles.title: A Nintendo Switch OLED Mario Red Edition console has been announced | VGC - Video Games Chronicle
articles.description: It will launch in October ahead of Super Mario Bros.
articles.content:
Nintendo has announced a Switch OLED Mario Red Edition console.
Confirming an earlier leak, the console was officially revealed during a Nintendo Direct live stream on Thursday.

articles.title: Southampton: Boys who smoke risk passing on damaged genes - BBC
articles.description: Their children risk developing obesity and lung problems, say University of Southampton scientists.
articles.content:
Boys who smoke in their early teens risk passing on damaged genes to their own children, new research has found.
The study from the universities of Southampton and Bergen in Norway examined 875 peop… [+1780 chars]

articles.title: Physicists finally observe strange isotope Oxygen 28 – raising fundamental questions - Nature.com
articles.description: The long-sought finding challenges scientists' understanding of the strong nuclear force, and the AI that can beat human champions at drone racing.
